text: Rosario Olivo (born 18 April 1940) is an Italian politician. He was born in Catanzaro, Italy. He is a member of the Italian Socialist Party. He was deputy from 1992 to 2001 and was the President of Calabria from 1987 to 1992. In 2006, he was elected mayor of Catanzaro. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Calabria Category:Italian mayors
title: Rosario Olivo
